oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry & the Castalia Police Dept. presents in person Carl & Pearl Butler
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Butler, Carl; Butler, Pearl; Connelly, Jim; Linn, Betty; Ripley, Jack; Grand Ole Opry (Radio program)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and black on white) Grand Ole Opry poster from the 1970s featuring three shows at Margaretta High School on Sunday, August 7. Cast includes Carl & Pearl Butler, Jim Connelly and the Country Reactions, Jack Ripley stuttering comedian, Betty Linn, and also a Sky Diving Exhibition. Features a metal photoplate of Carl and Pearl Butler. Purchase order 18961.
